extendedInfo.description: The Photographer's Ephemeris (TPE) helps you plan outdoor photography shoots. TPE is a map-centric sun and moon calculator: see how the light will fall on the land, be it day or night, for almost anywhere on earth. Ideal for landscape, nature, travel and outdoor photographers, TPE's map-based approach means you can search for any place name on the planet or position the map pin exactly where you want it. Advanced features include: automatic time zone and elevation detection, correction for atmospheric refraction and height above the horizon. You can even determine when the sun or moon will be visible from behind nearby hills and mountains. Key features: - Time and direction of sunrise and sunset - Time and direction of moonrise and moonset - Phase of the moon and % illumination - Times of civil, nautical and astronomical twilight - Graphical display on a map (Standard, Satellite, Hybrid, Terrain)- Rotate and tilt the map for the optimal view- Compass-based auto-rotation of the map- Movable map pins - drag and drop the pin exactly where you need it - Search for locations by place name or enter coordinates directly- Save any location you want - no fixed lists- All features available in both portrait and landscape mode- Does not require network connection for rise/set time, azimuths and sun/moon position Advanced features: - Automatic time zone detection for any location on earth - Determines elevation above sea level - View azimuth and altitude of sun/moon for any time of day/night - Distance, bearing and elevation angle between any two points Geek features: - Find when the sun/moon will appear from behind a hill - Compensation for atmospheric refraction - Compensation for elevation above the horizon Note: - Maps and elevation-based calculations require a data connection to function - Locations outside Â±80Â° latitude (very far north and south) are unsupported- Map auto-rotate requires a compatible device (with magnetometer and accelerometer)- Requires that you have Google Play Services and Google Maps installed on your device. Most devices already have both installed. TPE will prompt you to install these if they are missing.Please visit http://photoephemeris.com/support#android_support if you have any trouble installing Google Play Services.TPE desktop version has been a favorite of photographers around the world for four years. Now you can carry it with you.

reviews.title: Essential
reviews.comment: I first discovered this app on the fruit based smartphone. Upon moving across I checked that this app was available as a prerequisite. Necessary for any landscape photographer.
reviews.author: Eddie Dodd

reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
reviews.comment: Can I rate it 10 stars?! Amazing app! Intuitive, fast and acts like it was actually developed by a human photographer! GET IT!
reviews.author: Gi Pamperien

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Just got my first android phone, and this is the only app I have paid for.  Used the PC version a lot, so happy to bung a few quid the authors way.
reviews.author: Danny Cooper

reviews.title: I love this app...
reviews.comment: This app is so much better than sundroid.. so many more options...  I would like to see reminders that link to alarms on my phone or to Google Calendars?? For instance, I used this app to predict where the sun would be in relation to a certain building in my hometown and discovered that it would be in the perfect spot on April 19th 2013.. I could set a reminder in my Google calendars, but it would be much easier if this app allowed me to set up an alert from the interface...(doesn\'t even have to be with Google Calendars)   Sundroid will allow me to set \"alarms\" for certain days etc in relation to the sun/moon rise/set/Twilight... etc etc... This capability would be perfect for your app..   Found this app when it was mentioned in March 2013 Outdoor Photographer Magazine... (pg 72)   JUST AWESOME stuff!! Highly recommended...  Samsung GS3
reviews.author: Daniel Enloe

reviews.title: Brilliiant
reviews.comment: This coupled with the desktop version is brilliant.
reviews.author: Mick Davies

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: It would be fantastic tool if you are landscape photographer,  I installed it and try to use it,  There is some missing functionalities, App works as long as you have data signal,  If App gives me a simple campus and points the moon and sun direction, it will be so helpful when I\'m in the area with no signal,  If App gives me the very basic lunar calendar monthly table, it will be helpful when I want arrange some outing plan,  I appreciate App and whoever made it,  Completely, totally recommendable,
reviews.author: Adel Tabibz

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: Excellent app for photographers!  HTC Droid DNA
reviews.author: Doug Quick

reviews.title: Essential tool for photographers
reviews.comment: Works perfectly on both my devices.
reviews.author: Nerys Osbourn

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Nothing more to say. Works like a charm.

reviews.comment: So useful!

reviews.title: A \"must have\"
reviews.comment: One of those must have\' apps for anyone with an interest in photography

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Worst ap ive ever paid for

reviews.title: Simple and very useful
reviews.comment: More acurate on my Pin location than Google Map is.

reviews.title: Dk
reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: Damian Kerley

reviews.comment: Very helpful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The most useful app I have
reviews.comment: I have been using tpe for a while on the computer, but the convenience or carrying it with you is great. It has save me hours of waiting time by providing me precise info for the architectural photography I do. Thanks for this development.
reviews.author: Martin Solarte

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: A must have for all photographers. Where and when the sun rises and sets allowing you to get to the ideal location for the golden hours. Best app i have.
reviews.author: Mark Watson

reviews.title: Lloyd
reviews.comment: Brilliant just brilliant for planning photoshoots
reviews.author: LLOYD BINNS

reviews.title: Very useful, developers responsive
reviews.comment: I let them know I was concerned about the new \"list running apps\" permission. Within about 2 hours, on a Sunday, they had removed it.

reviews.title: No map rotation?
reviews.comment: Seems like an important feature has been forgotten... please insert map rotation. Amazing app.
reviews.author: Martin Gilbert
